      Add value to array at the given path
      DocumentContext add(String path, Object value, Predicate... filters)
      Add value to array List array = new ArrayList(){{ add(0); add(1); }}; JsonPath.parse(array).add("$", 2); assertThat(array).containsExactly(0,1,2);

    • 方法详细资料

      • configuration

        Configuration configuration()
        Returns the configuration used for reading
        返回:
        an immutable configuration

      • json

        <T> T json()
        Returns the JSON model that this context is operating on
        返回:
        json model

      • jsonString

        String jsonString()
        Returns the JSON model that this context is operating on as a JSON string
        返回:
        json model as string

      • set

        DocumentContext set(String path,
                    Object newValue,
                    Predicate... filters)
        Set the value a the given path
        参数:
        path - path to set
        newValue - new value
        filters - filters
        返回:
        a document context

      • set

        DocumentContext set(JsonPath path,
                    Object newValue)
        Set the value a the given path
        参数:
        path - path to set
        newValue - new value
        返回:
        a document context

      • map

        DocumentContext map(String path,
                    MapFunction mapFunction,
                    Predicate... filters)
        Replaces the value on the given path with the result of the MapFunction.
        参数:
        path - path to be converted set
        mapFunction - Converter object to be invoked
        filters - filters
        返回:
        a document context

      • map

        DocumentContext map(JsonPath path,
                    MapFunction mapFunction)
        Replaces the value on the given path with the result of the MapFunction.
        参数:
        path - path to be converted set
        mapFunction - Converter object to be invoked (or lambda:))
        返回:
        a document context

                       Predicate... filters)

        参数:

        参数:

        返回:

      • add

        DocumentContext add(String path,
                    Object value,
                    Predicate... filters)
        Add value to array 
         
 List array = new ArrayList(){{
      add(0);
      add(1);
 }};

 JsonPath.parse(array).add("$", 2);

 assertThat(array).containsExactly(0,1,2);
        参数:
        path - path to array
        value - value to add
        filters - filters
        返回:
        a document context

      • add

        DocumentContext add(JsonPath path,
                    Object value)
        Add value to array at the given path
        参数:
        path - path to array
        value - value to add
        返回:
        a document context

      • put

        DocumentContext put(String path,
                    String key,
                    Object value,
                    Predicate... filters)
        Add or update the key with a the given value at the given path
        参数:
        path - path to object
        key - key to add
        value - value of key
        filters - filters
        返回:
        a document context

      • put

        DocumentContext put(JsonPath path,
                    String key,
                    Object value)
        Add or update the key with a the given value at the given path
        参数:
        path - path to array
        key - key to add
        value - value of key
        返回:
        a document context

      • renameKey

        DocumentContext renameKey(String path,
                          String oldKeyName,
                          String newKeyName,
                          Predicate... filters)
        Renames the last key element of a given path.
        参数:
        path - The path to the old key. Should be resolved to a map or an array including map items.
        oldKeyName - The old key name.
        newKeyName - The new key name.
        filters - filters.
        返回:
        a document content.

      • renameKey

        DocumentContext renameKey(JsonPath path,
                          String oldKeyName,
                          String newKeyName)
        Renames the last key element of a given path.
        参数:
        path - The path to the old key. Should be resolved to a map or an array including map items.
        oldKeyName - The old key name.
        newKeyName - The new key name.
        返回:
        a document content.
